_README: This file is DEPRECATED as of August 22, 2023.
It previously interacted with content/archived-programs and the previous programs.jsx page.
For more information on its usage, see this previous commit:
If you add a new group, THIS IS NOT THE ONLY FILE YOU MUST EDIT.
The new group must also be added to CloudCannon as an option for drop-down menus.
Navigate to cloudcannon.config.cjs, then _select_data, then add to parentGroups.
